thread.title: Ronaldo sets the tone as Real top La Liga table
thread.title_full: Ronaldo sets the tone as Real top La Liga table

author: NewsWire
title: Ronaldo sets the tone as Real top La Liga table
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
London, Oct.25 (ANI): Real Madrid stretched their unbeaten run to 12 games as they thrashed 10-man Celta de Vigo 3-1 to move three points clear of the second-placed rival at the top of La Liga table. 
Cristiano Ronaldo opened the scoring in the eighth minute before Brazilian full-back Danilo doubled the lead to give Real a commanding 2-0 lead by 23rd minute. 
Celta’s hopes of staging a fightback suffered a heavy blow in the 57th minute when the centre back Gustavo Cabral was given marching orders after earning a second yellow card, the Guardian reported. 
Although Nolito pulled one back for Celta through with a stunning drive five minutes from time, Marcelo scored in the final minute to make it 3-1. (ANI) Related Posts
